channel.title: Bare Metal Cloud Status - Incident History

item.title: [GRA2/RBX7/RBX8/LIM1][Dedicated Servers] - Multiple racks maintenance notification
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Feb 10, 2026, 01:00 - 05:00 UTC

Nov 27, 02:36 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our Dedicated Servers offer, affecting servers in racks R715A10,L115A18,R714B05,R717A19,R713B08,R717B20,R719A20,R717A07,R804L02 and G243A06.

Start time : 10/02/2026 01:00 UTC
End time : 10/02/2026 05:00 UTC
Service impact : vRack network will be temporarily unavailable up to 1 hour during the maintenance for servers in the specified racks.
Service improvement : Following our continuous improvement policy of our network infrastructure, we will be doing a maintenance on multiple network equipment.

Thank you for your understanding.

item.description:

Nov 27, 14:58 UTC

item.title: [GRA3][Dedicated Servers] - Room GRA0319A maintenance notification
item.description:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jan 21, 2026, 06:00 - 11:00 UTC

Dec 11, 21:28 UTC
Scheduled - As part of our continuous improvement plan, maintenance is scheduled on our network infrastructure.

Start time : 21/01/2026 06:00 UTC
End time : 21/01/2026 11:00 UTC
Service impact : Customers may experience up to 5 hours of service unavailability affecting the racks listed below :
GRA0319A02C
GRA0319A03A
GRA0319A03B
GRA0319A03C
GRA0319A04C

During the maintenance window, access to the IPMI (Intelligent Platform Management Interface) will be temporarily unavailable for the racks listed below :
GRA0319A01A
GRA0319A01B
GRA0319A01C
GRA0319A02A
GRA0319A02B
GRA0319A02C
GRA0319A03A
GRA0319A03B
GRA0319A03C
GRA0319A04C
Please note that the maintenance may take less time than expected.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our network infrastructure, we will have to carry out interventions on multiple network equipment on the specified racks.

Thank you for your understanding.
